channel.title: Allstar Project Help
channel.description: Hey Mopar! Im currently working on an Allstar server to help me learn to program in java better. The only problem I am coming across is the stupid emote tab. It is terrible and i would like to know how to change the text in it? Thanks for any suggestions, they are greatly appreciated! :)

item.title: Allstar Project Help
item.dc:creator: @ArticBlooms ArticBlooms
item.description:
@ArticBlooms wrote:

Thank you for all your help and suggestions guys! I will be sure to use them all, i downloaded eclipse and hopefully it will help me out! Thank you once again!

Read full topic

item.title: Allstar Project Help
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

ArticBlooms:

Sadly, no. I just wanna know what file I can edit the emote tab in. I do not need to be spoon-fed, i just wanna be pointed in the right direction

Love the attitude.

I don’t know what class it’s in, but it’s allstar so it’s probably packed in the client class. If not, I already apologized before-hand.

Anyways, a suggestion would be to use Eclipse in order to help you on your journey. It’s a wonderful tool and comes packed with countless features that can make programming quite a lot easier

Read full topic

item.title: Allstar Project Help
item.dc:creator: @pray4urlife pray4urlife
item.description:
@pray4urlife wrote:

[quote=“ArticBlooms, post:3, topic:437030”]Sadly, no. I just wanna know what file I can edit the emote tab in. I do not need to be spoon-fed, i just wanna be pointed in the right direction ;)[/quote]I wasnt planning to spoon fed it was so it would be easier to talk, but i havent messed with a allstar for a while but just do ctrl-f then search for veng, gsmini or something its pretty simple… I know it probably doesnt make sense but i havent messed with them soo thats why… hope i helped some!
